attributes.action: Shut down the the Defence Export Services Organisation, the government funded body that brokers arms sales abroad for UK companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: DESO uses taxpayers money to fund activities that effectively make it a sales office for the UK arms industry. They frequently deal with corrupt and brutal regimes. The argument that this creates UK jobs is not a valid defense of providing weapons to criminals. There are other industries that our money could be used to fund, not least the environmental industry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
